about: Policy of use: you must state somewhere somehow (credit lines, web page, whatever) that the Freesound Project served this sounds. It is irrelevant to me whether you mention or not my authorship. Can't credit? Send me a personal message. (Thanks to dobroide for these words!) If possible, I would also like to hear where the sounds are used, so if you can send me a link or something else, please do so. Thanks! For some more information about me, click on the links below: http://www.c-o-l-o-u-r-s.org/. If you want to support our label, please buy something over there. Check this out: https://cyclesofmoebius.bandcamp.com/ Check this little remix I created on Metapop: https://metapop.com/sonicviz/remixes/20180510-bamz-stojo-mix-2wav-remix/35865 Here it is, finally, entering with a DREUN... http://belgianneumusik.be/album/wed022-10111 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zc3PnLDaNqw https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R_LzIoaHaTE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xTRWRUwVNQQ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dY53DmUCEpc Namaste! Jovica Storer
